content: वेदिः [विद्-इन्] A learned man, sage, Paṇḍita. --दिः, -दी {%<ab>f.</ab>%} {@--1@} An altar especially one prepared for a sacrifice; अमी वेदिं परितः कॢप्तधिष्ण्याः (वह्रयः) <ls>Ś. 4. 7.</ls> {@--2@} An altar of a particular shape, the middle points of which come very close to each other; मध्येन सा वेदिविलग्नमध्या <ls>Ku. 1. 39</ls>; (some propose to take वेदि in this passage as meaning ‘a sealring’). {@--3@} A quadrangular spot in the court-yard of a temple or palace. {@--4@} A seal-ring. {@--5@} <ab>N.</ab> of Sarasvatī. {@--6@} A tract or region.
